NOT_FOUND_PAGE.404_2: Do not panic, we can help you.

SECURITY_CODE_MANDATORY: Security code is mandatory for create an operator account
WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_MESSAGE: The interface is closed, please wait.

ADVANCED.ADD_ALL: Add all songs to the other list

KARA_MENU.FREE: Free this kara from user's quota
KARA_MENU.TRANSFER_KARA: Transfer this song - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song

BLC.BLC_DESC: Select and add blacklist criteria to automatically hide specific songs.
BLC.COPY_TO: Copy criteria to the following list :

PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.RESTRICTED_DESCRIPTION: Karaoke is in restricted mode, you can't add songs.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_KARA_DESCRIPTION: You can only suggest {{count}} song. You'll be able to suggest songs again once the operator has accepted or refused your suggestion or when your song is played on screen.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_KARA_DESCRIPTION_plural: You can only suggest {{count}} songs. You will be able to suggest again once the operator has added (or not added) your suggestion or when your song is played back on the screen.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_TIME_DESCRIPTION: You can only suggest {{time}} of song time. You will be able to suggest more once the operator has accepted or refused your suggestion or when your song is played on screen.

LYRICS_EXPL.LINES: The current song lyrics will be displayed here.
LYRICS_EXPL.CURRENT: The bold line represents the currently sung line.

AUTOMIX_MODAL.TITLE: Create an AutoMix
AUTOMIX_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: The created playlist will be filled with the selected users' favorites for the duration you specify.

CL_ADD_RANDOM_TITLE: How many random songs do you want to add?
CL_DELETE_CRITERIAS_PLAYLIST: Delete criteria blacklist of type '{{type}}' that contains all these songs :
GOTO_TOP: Go to start of the playlist
GOTO_BOTTOM: Go to end of the playlist

LOG_OFFLINE.TITLE: Offline Mode
LOG_OFFLINE.MESSAGE: Changes to your profile will not be registered

CONFIRM_FAV_IMPORT: Overwrite your favorites with this import?
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA: Add this song to the playlist
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA_ADMIN: right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_ADD_SELECT_KARA: Add selected songs to the playlist - right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_TRANSFER_SELECT_KARA: Transfer selected songs - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_ACCEPT_KARA: Accept song (free the song and copy to current list)
TOOLTIP_ACCEPT_SELECT_KARA: Accept songs (free songs and copy to current list)

SYSTEMPANEL_TIP.QUESTION: You can't find the options you seek?
SYSTEMPANEL_TIP.RESPONSE: Some options are now in the

PLAYER.LABEL: Player
PLAYER.ALWAYS_ON_TOP_TOOLTIP: If checked, the player window will always be above the others on the screen
PLAYER.FULLSCREEN_TOOLTIP: Hit F on a fullscreen player to reduce it to windowed mode.
PLAYER.VIDEO_POSITION_X_TOOLTIP: Where the player window will be located on screen at startup
PLAYER.VIDEO_POSITION_Y_TOOLTIP: Where the player window will be located on screen at startup
PLAYER.MONITOR_NUMBER_TOOLTIP: Screen on which Karaoke Mugen will be displayed at startup
PLAYER.WINDOWBORDERS: Enable borders on the player window
PLAYER.WINDOWBORDERS_TOOLTIP: Disabling them won't disable them for the monitor, where they're always enabled.
PLAYER.PLAYER_MONITOR_TOOLTIP: Displays a second window for the operator if he cannot see the main screen directly
PLAYER.DISPLAY_CONNECTION_INFO_HOST_TOOLTIP: If your IP address is incorrectly detected by Karaoke Mugen, you can force it here.
PLAYER.DISPLAY_CONNECTION_INFO_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: For example the wifi network on which your guests must connect
PLAYER.DISPLAY_NICKNAME_TOOLTIP: Displays at the bottom of the screen at the start and end of a song
PLAYER.DISPLAY_AVATAR_TOOLTIP: The song requester's avatar will be displayed at the beginning and the end of the song in the lower right corner of the player's screen.

KARAOKE.LABEL: Karaoke
KARAOKE.QUOTA_TYPE_TOOLTIP: Quota helps prevent users from adding too many songs at once
KARAOKE.SONGS_BY_USER_TOOLTIP: Number of songs a user can request simultaneously. A song released or which has just been played no longer counts towards the quota
KARAOKE.FREE_AUTO_TIME: Songs are freed from quota after (min)
KARAOKE.FREE_AUTO_TIME_TOOLTIP: After X minutes, the song will no longer count towards the user's quota. Adjust this according to your number of guests participating
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES: Allow users to upvote songs to free them
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_TOOLTIP: If enough people like a song suggestion, it won't count anymore towards the requester's quota
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDMIN: Minimum votes required to free a song
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDMIN_TOOLTIP: Change this depending on your number of users connected
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDPERCENT: Percentage of upvotes / online users required to to free a song
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDPERCENT_TOOLTIP: Percentage of the number of logged in users
KARAOKE.AUTOPLAY_TOOLTIP: Autoplay begins as soon as a song is added to the playlist
KARAOKE.ALLOW_DUPLICATES_TOOLTIP: With this option, a playlist can contain the same song twice (or more). Only operators can add the same song more than once to a playlist. The song can be added again only if it has already been played before.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE: Display an on-screen message regularly to invite users to add a song when randomly playing after playlist end
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE_TOOL: The message will be displayed at the center of the screen when Karaoke Mugen will play random songs, inviting users to add songs to the playlist
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_INTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Intro videos are played only once if you start playing the first song of the current playlist. A sponsor jingle video follows, if available.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_OUTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Outro videos are played only once after the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_ENCORES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: This video will play before the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_SPONSORS_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Sponsors are played every X songs, as well as after the intro video if enabled
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_JINGLES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Jingles are played every X songs
KARAOKE.CLASSIC_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause will take place between each song and the name of the next song as well as its requester will be displayed on the screen. The song requester or operator will be able to start playing the song
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the operator be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the public be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_ON: Songs will be added as mystery songs (you can define the song labels in settings)
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_OFF: Songs will be added normally (visible to the public)
KARAOKE.LABELS_MYSTERY_SONGS_TOOLTIP: You can customize how mystery songs are displayed to the public
KARAOKE.STREAM_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause (with a configurable duration) will happen between each song, and you can enable poll votes through Twitch chatsera faite entre chaque chanson, et vous pouvez activer les votes du sondage par le chat Twitch
KARAOKE.STREAMER_MODE_LABEL: Karaoke Mugen is writing text files that you can use in your streaming software, to create a custom overlay.
KARAOKE.STREAM_TWITCH_TOOLTIP: Adds commands to vote during polls, or get the currently playing song with !song
KARAOKE.STREAM_TWITCH_OAUTH_TOKEN_GET: Get your OAuth Token Twitch here
KARAOKE.MINUTES_BEFORE_SESSION_ENDS_WARNING: Display warning X minutes before end of playlist
KARAOKE.MINUTES_BEFORE_SESSION_ENDS_WARNING_TOOL: A notification will warn you X minutes before the end of your planned session
KARAOKE.ENABLE_SMARTINSERT: Enable smart insert of songs to avoid user monopolies
KARAOKE.ENABLE_SMARTINSERT_TOOLTIP: When a song is added by the audience, it will be placed so that those who have not requested a lot of songs will be placed earlier
KARAOKE.ENABLE_AUTOBALANCE_TOOLTIP: The playlist will be reorganized regularly so that user requests take turns.
KARAOKE.HIDE_INVISIBLE_SONGS_TOOLTIP: The way mystery songs are displayed to the public. Best for surprises!
KARAOKE.SONGPOLL_TOOLTIP: A poll will happen at the beginning of each song on your users' devices or on the Twitch chat. In Stream mode, the poll will happen during pauses
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLCHOICES: Number of songs users can choose from during public poll
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLCHOICES_TOOLTIP: Each choice will be selected from the suggestion playlist
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLTIMEOUT_TOOLTIP: In seconds. It's better if it's lower than the Stream mode's pause timer!
KARAOKE.FETCH_POPULAR_SONGS: Fetch popular songs from your online repositories
KARAOKE.FETCH_POPULAR_SONGS_TOOLTIP: If disabled, popular songs will be calculated from your Karaoke Mugen app
KARAOKE.REMOTE_TOOLTIP: Enable this to allow your friends to suggest songs on your karaoke session!

ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.NAME: End of playlist action
ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.TOOLTIP: If you choose Random Songs, they'll be picked from your song library. Combined with AutoPlay, your playlist can resume as soon as someone adds a new song.

OPTIONS.RANDOM: Play random songs from the library

INTERFACE.LABEL: Interface
INTERFACE.WEBAPPMODE_TOOLTIP: What your guests will see when they log into the interface
INTERFACE.SHOW_AVATARS_ON_PLAYLIST_TOOLTIP: To know who added what at a glance

KARA_PAUSED_TAGLINES: We will follow up on your call.
Your waiting time is estimated to some minutes.
Too calm, I don't like this...
ENCORES_TAGLINES: Well, it's not because I like you or anything...
Last song, let's give it our all!
QUOTA_AVAILABLE: You can add songs again now!
SERIE_NAME_MODE_TOOLTIP: Changes the way series names are displayed on the song list. Might be ignored by user preferences
REMOTE_RESET_TOOLTIP: Generates a new token, you will lose your room code.
REMOTE_RESET_CONFIRM: Your room code will be freed and a new one will be generated for you, are you sure?
VIEW_LIKES_TOOLTIP: The song with the most likes will be showed first, this does not impact the real playlist order.
KARA_SUGGESTION_NOT_FOUND: Can't find your favorite song?  Check your configured online repositories as well as the suggestions site if your wish has not already been granted:

ONLINE_STATS.TITLE: Stats
ONLINE_STATS.INTRO: Karaoke Mugen can send anonymous information about your instance to Karaoke Mugen Server to create usage statistics.

DETAILS.2: Which karaokes got requested (but not by whom)
DETAILS.3: Information about the computer (CPU, available RAM, OS name and version ...)
DETAILS.4: Application settings (excluding any private info like password)
DETAILS.TITLE: Sent information details
DETAILS.OUTRO: Stats are sent at each startup, then at each hour of use. You can read the information sent in the Karaoke Mugen log directory.

ONLINE_STATS.CHANGE: You can change your choice at any time from the options.
ONLINE_STATS.QUESTION: Do you agree to send these statistics to Karaoke Mugen Server?
ONLINE_STATS.ERROR: Karaoke Mugen may send information about your instance to Sentry.io during errors. This helps us solve them as they come up much faster. Do you agree to send these error reports?

SELECT_KARAS_REQUIRED: You have to select at least one song
MAKE_ACCOUNT_ADMIN_MESSAGE: If you want to make your account an operator account, write the 6 numbers security code and validate.
USER_SONG_PLAYS_IN: Your song {{kara}} has been added and will airing in {{time}} ({{date}})

UNKNOW_REPOS.TITLE: Unknown repositories detected
UNKNOW_REPOS.DESCRIPTION: This playlist contains songs from repositories you do not have yet locally.
UNKNOW_REPOS.DOWNLOAD_THEM: Do you want to add them now?

MODAL.PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL: Warning : the current playlist '{{playlist}}' isn't displayed on screen. That's the playlist going to be played. Are you sure you want to start playing?

PROFILE_MODAL.ONLINE_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from the online server @{{instance}}. Are you sure you want to do this?
PROFILE_MODAL.LOCAL_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from this local app only. If you have an online account, it won't be disabled. Are you sure you want to do this?
PROFILE_MODAL.MISSING_EMAIL: Warning: without email you will not be able to reset your password!
PROFILE_MODAL.FLAG_SENDSTATS: Use my favorites and karaokes requests for stats

SHUFFLE_MODAL.TITLE: Shuffle playlist
SHUFFLE_MODAL.LABEL: Shuffling does not affects songs already played. Choose a method to shuffle the playlist:
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SHUFFLE_DESC: The playlist will be shuffled randomly, without any influence applied to the mix
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SMART_SHUFFLE_DESC: Prevents long songs or songs by the same person from following each other
SHUFFLE_MODAL.BALANCE_DESC: Reorders songs by pools of users (A-B-C, A-B-C, etc.)
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SORTUPVOTES_DESC: Sort by decreasing number of likes (most popular songs first)

PLAYLIST_MODAL.NAME: Name
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CURRENT_DESC: The current list is the one read by the media player
PLAYLIST_MODAL.ACTIVE_DESC: The active blacklist criteria set is the one used by Karaoke Mugen.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.PUBLIC_DESC: The public list is the one collecting suggestions from the public
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_CURRENT_PLAYLIST: You cannot have no current playlist, edit the one you want to set as the new current playlist.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_CURRENT_BLC: You cannot have no active blacklist criteria set, edit the one you want to set as the new active set (or empty it if you want no blacklist).
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_PUBLIC: You cannot have no public playlist, edit the one you want to set as the new public playlist.

CROP_AVATAR_MODAL.TITLE: Crop your avatar
CROP_AVATAR_MODAL.HELP: Resize the square to have the perfect profile picture.

TUTORIAL.TITLE: Tutorial
TUTORIAL.WELCOME: Welcome to Karaoke Mugen! Here's what you need to know.
TUTORIAL.PLAYLIST: The screen shows two playlists. You can add a song from the left playlist to the right playlist and vice versa just by clicking on
TUTORIAL.TITLE_CLICK: Click on the karaoke title for more information
TUTORIAL.ADD_TO_OTHER_PLAYLIST: adds the song to the other playlist.
TUTORIAL.WRENCH_BUTTON_DESC: allows other actions on a song.
TUTORIAL.KARAOKE_PLAYED: icon means this song has been recently played.
TUTORIAL.KARAOKE_PLAYING: background means the song is selected for playback.
TUTORIAL.CREATE_PLAYLIST_BUTTON: Create and edit your playlists from the actions menu
TUTORIAL.SELECT_PLAYLIST_BUTTON: Playlists are available in the selector :
TUTORIAL.LIBRARY: The library shows all available karaoke songs.
TUTORIAL.CURRENT_DESC: playlist is the one used by the player.
TUTORIAL.PUBLIC_DESC: playlist is where your users' requests are.
TUTORIAL.BLACLIST_CRITERIAS_DESC: The blacklist criterias allow you to exclude certain songs
TUTORIAL.BLACLIST_DESC: The blacklist contains all excluded songs
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_BAR: The Karaoke Mugen Player can be controlled from the top bar.
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_CURRENT_HINT: The player will play the selected song in the
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_GO_BACK: The Rewind button allows you to go back to
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_STOP: The Stop button will stop playback once the current song ends. You can click on it again to stop
TUTORIAL.MESSAGE: You can send a message to your public (on their devices or the player screen) with the Message button.
TUTORIAL.K_MENU: The "K Menu" allows you to modify your profile and other karaoke settings.

RESTART_DOWNLOADS_MODAL.TITLE: Downloads pending
RESTART_DOWNLOADS_MODAL.LABEL: Some downloads are pending from your last session. What do you want to do?

DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.TITLE: Delete {{playlist}} forever?
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.IMPOSSIBLE: You cannot delete the only playlist.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.IMPOSSIBLE_BLC: You cannot delete the only criteria list.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_CURRENT_BLC: This list is defined as current blacklist criteria, change the current criteria list for another to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_PUBLIC: This list is defined as public, change the public playlist for another to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_CURRENT: This list is defined as current , change the current playlist for another to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_CURRENT_PUBLIC: This list is defined as current and public, change the current and public playlist for another to delete this one.

STATS_MODAL.TITLE: Use my favorites and karaokes requests for stats
STATS_MODAL.DESC: We use your favorites as well as the karaokes that you have requested during a session to make usage statistics (for example, to find out the most requested karaokes).
STATS_MODAL.REFUSE_DESC: If you do not want to participate, even if it's anonymous, in these usage statistics, please let us know. If you refuse, your data will be ignored by the server and not sent by the Karaoke Mugen Application.
STATS_MODAL.CHANGE: You can change this at any time in your profile. Do you accept the usage of your stats?

CLASSIC_MODE.TITLE: It's your turn to sing!
CLASSIC_MODE.TEXT: Click on the Play button to start your song.

SETUP_PAGE.TITLE: Setup Wizard
SETUP_PAGE.NEED_ACCOUNT: Before you can start singing, you'll need an account to use the app.
SETUP_PAGE.ACCOUNT_QUESTION: Do you want to use a local account (on your computer only) or an online account (Internet access required)?
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: An online account allows you to:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_SAVE_INFOS: Backup your favorite songs, avatar and profile info to get them again from another computer.
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_LOST_PASSWORD: If you supply an email address, you'll be able to recover your account if you forget your password.
SETUP_PAGE.LOCAL_ACCOUNT_DESC: You chose a local account. Type in an account name and a password below:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE: Your online account will be hosted on the {{instance}} instance
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE_DESC: An instance is an online service providing several services to Karaoke Mugen. If you're not sure, leave the default instance ({{instance}}), or if you know what you're doing, change it to the instance of your choice.
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: I want to create a new account
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Type in an account name and a password to create one.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_CONSOLE: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find by looking for "SECURITY CODE FOR THIS SESSION" in the Karaoke Mugen log file or in the console.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_USE: This code makes sure you're really the one doing these actions. It changes after each use.
SETUP_PAGE.CONNECTED_MESSAGE: Congratulations, you're logged in to Karaoke Mugen, {{user}}!
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_1: Karaoke Mugen has a default karaokes repository,
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_2: . Its media files will be downloaded as you need them.
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_QUESTION: Where do you want to store these downloads? By default they'll be in:
SETUP_PAGE.REPOSITORY_LATER: You can change this folder at any time.

ERROR.PLAYER_RANDOM_SONG_AFTER_PLAYLIST: Unable to select a random song to play after playlist ends
ERROR.POLL_ALREADY_STARTED: A poll is already in progress
ERROR.POLL_PUBLIC_PL_EMPTY: Unable to start poll: public playlist is empty
ERROR.POLL_NOT_ENOUGH_SONGS: Unable to start poll: not enough songs available

INFO.POLL_WINNER: People voted for a new song!
INFO.END_OF_SESSION_NEAR: The karaoke session should end in {{data}} minutes.

LOADING_SUBTITLE: It shouldn't take too long, try to clear your cache or update your browser if you get stuck here.
LOADING_SUBTITLE_ELECTRON: It shouldn't take too long, try to restart Karaoke Mugen or update it if you get stuck here.

KARA.TITLE: Title
KARA.TITLE_TOOLTIP: If you don't know, put the name of the series here as well
KARA.SERIES_TOOLTIP: TV series, movie title, video game title, etc.
KARA.SERIES_SINGERS_REQUIRED: Series or Singer cannot be empty in the same time.
KARA.ORDER_TOOLTIP: Opening/Ending number. If this is the only opening/ending in the series, leave blank.
KARA.YEAR_TOOLTIP: Year when the series was broadcasted or the video was produced
KARA.CREATORS_TOOLTIP: Entity that created the series. Can be animation studio, movie studio, or game studio
KARA.KARA_AUTHORS_REQUIRED: Author of the kara is mandatory
KARA.COMMENT_TOOLTIP: A commentary field for things like "To all my fans!" or "Don't modify the effects!" or "Made with lots of coffee".
KARA.GROUPS_TOOLTIP: Download groups for this song. The song will be included in these download packs
KARA.VERSIONS_TOOLTIP: Versions allow a better identification of songs with the same title. If no version applies to this song because it's too specific (ex. Future Vers. or Chihaya Vers.) indicate it in its title by adding " ~Chihaya Vers." to it.
KARA.DOWNLOAD_ALL_TOOLTIP: Download all retrieved medias at once

BATCH_EDIT.CREATE_PLAYLIST: First, you need to create a playlist in the operator panel.

KARA.PROBLEMATIC_TOOLTIP: This song contains scenes ({{tags}}) that may be problematic for some viewers.
KARA.DELETE_ALL_TOOLTIP: Remove all displayed karaokes at once
KARA.MISSING_DOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: This karaoke is not downloaded, you will need Internet in order to play it. You can make it work offline by downloading the media.
KARA.ONLINE_REPOSITORIES: Some of your karaokes are from remote repositories (kara.moe server for example), these karaokes are not editable through this interface, to make sure that the repositories stays in sync. You can check the "Maintainer mode" checkbox in the repository settings, you will not receive any updates anymore but you will be able to edit or delete karaokes.

USERS.PASSWORD_VALIDATOR_MESSAGE: A user must have a password
USERS.EDIT_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: Online users cannot be edited from this page except to change their role on this Karaoke Mugen app. To edit your own profile online, do this from the public or operator interface.

DATABASE.REGENERATE_DB_DESCRIPTION:
Regenerate database. Generation makes Karaoke Mugen aware of all the files you have in your data folders.

This is usually done when the app starts, but you may want to do this manually if :
  • You added a repository and put files inside already
  • You modified files from outside the app
DATABASE.VALIDATE_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Validate all files in all enabled repositories to fix them if necessary. Maintainer use only.
DATABASE.DUMP_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION: Creates a karaokemugen.sql backup file in your data folder. This file can be used to create a restore point or to send your database to the devs if they ask you to do so.
DATABASE.RESTORE_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION:
Restores your database from the file karaokemugen.sql if it's present in your data folder.

**WARNING : This will overwrite ALL non-saved data in your database : playlists, sessions, etc.)
DATABASE.UPDATE_REPOS_DESCRIPTION: Forces a repository update, this can be useful if one of the repositories is in abnormal state.

TAGS.NAME: Original name
TAGS.NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the internal name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.SHORT_NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the short name used in the operator interface when displaying karaoke titles
TAGS.TYPES_TOOLTIP: This is the tag type, so it can be properly searched for by users
TAGS.ALIASES_TOOLTIP: Short names or alternative names, used for search
TAGS.I18N_TOOLTIP: There must be at least one name in any language (enter the original name in english if there are no others)
TAGS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current tag with another one
TAGS.MERGE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: Resulting tags will have the current Name and Short name. Types, Aliases and Translations will be merged and the resulting tags will contain all the information from source and destination tags
TAGS.DELETE_TAG_MESSAGE: This will remove the tag as well as in any song in your database!
TAGS.LANG_ERROR: A tag must have at least one translated name
TAGS.PROBLEMATIC_TOOLTIP: Is this tag problematic? Should it be a tag you'd want to warn users about? This helps mark some songs more easily in the operator/public interface. For example R18, Spoiler, or Epilepsy
TAGS.NOLIVEDOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: Songs with this tag won't be able to be downloaded on Karaoke Mugen Server from the web interface, or visible on Live
TAGS.PRIORITY_TOOLTIP: Tags with a higher value will be displayed first. 10 by default.

CONFIG.MESSAGE: To modify a setting, just edit it and press enter. Not all settings are editable and will return an error if you try anyway.

PROPERTIES.APP_QUICKSTART_TOOLTIP: This disables data verification. You will have to generate your database in case of modification manually from the system panel -> database page.
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_ERRORTRACKING: Send error and crash reports (via sentry.io)
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_STATS: Send usage telemetry to Karaoke Mugen Server
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_HARDWAREDECODING_TOOLTIP: Forces or not the player's hardware acceleration. Note: on some configurations, it can cause unexpected behavior during playback. In such cases, select "Disabled". The "Automatic" option is the safest, and "Force" the most risky/not recommended
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_DISCORD_DISPLAYACTIVITY: Show Karaoke Mugen activity on your Discord profile
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_PROGRESSBARDOCK: Player progress bar in Dock / Taskbar

SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORTED_DESC: Download session data by clicking on the following links
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_PLAYED_COUNT: Songs played (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_REQUESTED_COUNT: Songs requested (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.NAME: Name
SESSIONS.TITLE: Title
SESSIONS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current session with another one

REPOSITORIES.NAME: Repository name
REPOSITORIES.TOOLTIP_NAME: If it's an online repository, put its domaine name only here. If it's a local repository, name it as you want. For example 'My private little karaokes'
REPOSITORIES.AUTO_MEDIA_DOWNLOADS_TOOLTIP: If your connection is too slow, we recommend that you check this so that the videos are downloaded beforehand. It is also recommended for convention use or for streaming to avoid potential errors in the middle middle of a karaoke!
REPOSITORIES.MAINTAINER_MODE_TOOLTIP: To be activated if you participate in the maintenance of the deposit (the update of the repository is managed by you and no longer by Karaoke Mugen)
REPOSITORIES.MOVE_TOOLTIP: This allows you to define which repositories take priority when creating your database: the highest repositories will be taken into account first if two repositories have the same karaoke
REPOSITORIES.MOVING_MEDIA_ABOUT_MESSAGE: All repository media files will be moved to the new folder. If your repository has several media folders, all filles of all folders will be moved into the same target folder. If there are duplicate files, they'll be savagely overwritten.
REPOSITORIES.COMPARE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: This will allow you to compare then eventually copy lyrics files from one repository to another if they differ between the two same songs. Select a repository to compare lyrics with (it will be the destination repository when comes time to copy lyrics)
REPOSITORIES.LYRICS_ARE_DIFFERENT: The lyrics of these songs are different between the {{first}} repository and the {{second}} repository:
REPOSITORIES.CONFIRM_SURE: Do you want to synchronize the lyrics of repository {{second}} with those of repository {{first}}?
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO: There is multiple ways to manage space used by your repositories:
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO_DELETE: Like you've seen earlier, you have the ability to remove the unused medias for a month or all the medias. They will be redonwloaded when needed again but this will allow you to free space if you make a long karaoke night recently for example.
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO_MOVE: You have also the ability, in the repositories management page, to move the files of a repository somewhere else in an external disk, USB key or a network share, allowing you to free space on your main disk.
REPOSITORIES.NO_FREE_SPACE: Not enough disk space to download! Make space on your hard drive and restart the queue.

LABEL.TAG: The karaokes {{verb}} {{tag}} are on the blacklist.
LABEL.YEAR: The karaokes from year {{year}} are on the blacklist.

LABEL.SHORTER: The karaokes shorter than {{time}} seconds are on the blacklist.
LABEL.TITLE: The karaoke containing {{title}} in the title are on the blacklist.
LABEL.TAG_NAME: The karaoke with a tag containing {{title}} are on the blacklist.

BLACKLIST.EXPL: The blacklist is created from <1>the active blacklist criteria</1>, you can also add manually karaokes to this list.

HOME.SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: See logs, change configuration options, backup/restore your database, trigger a manual generation and manage karaoke session

HOME.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: List, create, edit tags (singers, songwriters, creators, song types, etc.)
HOME.USERS_DESCRIPTION: List, edit, create users, change their password, create new guests accounts

SESSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Add, remove, or view data from the different Karaoke sessions you have done.

REPOSITORIES.TITLE: Repositories management
REPOSITORIES.DESCRIPTION: Repositories are sources of karaoke. Add, enable, or remove repositories from this page.

UNUSED_FILES.TITLE: Unused files
UNUSED_FILES.DESCRIPTION: You can list unnecessary files (used by no karaoke) in your repositories from here.

DATABASE.TITLE: Database
DATABASE.DESCRIPTION: Database management tools. Database, database, just living in the database wow wow.

KARAOKE_LIST.TITLE: List of karaoke
KARAOKE_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can edit, add or delete karaoke. Usually for karaoke repository maintainers only.

KARAOKE_NEW.TITLE: Add a karaoke
KARAOKE_NEW.DESCRIPTION: This form allows you to add an already existing karaoke to one of your repositories.

DOWNLOAD_QUEUE.TITLE: Medias download queue
DOWNLOAD_QUEUE.DESCRIPTION: See the list of current and pending downloads.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Medias download manager
DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Find and get medias linked to karaoke from your configured repositories.

HISTORY.TITLE: Reading history
HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: Lists all the karaoke played on your application, in descending chronological order.

MOST_REQUESTED.TITLE: Most Popular Songs
MOST_REQUESTED.DESCRIPTION: Lists the most requested songs on your application. Only takes into account karaoke songs added from the public interface.
MOST_REQUESTED.DESCRIPTION_ONLINE: You're seeing the ONLINE popular song list right now. Disable the "Fetch popular songs online" setting to only see those from your instance.

MOST_PLAYED.TITLE: Most played songs
MOST_PLAYED.DESCRIPTION: List the most played songs on your application

KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.TITLE: Bulk add / remove tag
KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Maintainers only: this page allows you to add or remove a tag on several karaokes simultaneously.

TAG_LIST.TITLE: Tags list
TAG_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Maintainers only: list of tags your karaokes are made of.

TAG_NEW.TITLE: Create a tag
TAG_NEW.DESCRIPTION: Tag creation form. Remember to add an English translation at least.

TAG_EDIT.TITLE: Modify a tag
TAG_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Tag modification form. Only the original name change results in a file name change.

TAG_DUPLICATES.TITLE: List of duplicate tags
TAG_DUPLICATES.DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to see tags that have the same name but not the same category in order to merge them if necessary.

USER_LIST.TITLE: User management
USER_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can create, delete, modify users, but also reset their password or change their rights.

CHIBI.ONTOP: Show on top of other windows

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy
PRIVACY_POLICY.P1: Thank you for using Karaoke Mugen. We are managing the database and developing its software for free so any attention you give us make us happy. So again, thanks ❤.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P2: Your app was just updated to version 5.0 with a lot of new features, like a new public interface, remote access (we'll tell you about it later), a new version tag type which allows us to identify covers, alternative versions, etc. more easily.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P3: Since this is a free (as in free speech) and free (as in free beer) project, we consider it normal that you expect complete transparency from us on how your data is used. To reach this goal, we're going to sum up the data we're processing and how you can control that.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P4: Not at all, the data we get is anonymized or linked to your username. Let's see:
PRIVACY_POLICY.L1: If you use the online profile feature, your profile data (email, bio, site URL, etc.) as well as your favorites are sent in realtime to the server hosting your profile (by default it's kara.moe, our server.)
PRIVACY_POLICY.L3: If you use the remote access feature (https://<code>.kara.moe), your generated code is stored in memory on our server and your app. It expires after 10 days of not using it (so you can keep the same code if you use it often).
PRIVACY_POLICY.L4: If you enable stats, the app will periodically send stats on songs played, requested, and your karaoke sessions list. This data is never linked to your name or username. However, a unique ID is linked to your app so we can regroup stats.
PRIVACY_POLICY.L4_DETAILS: These statistics also include data on your computer hardware (memory, monitors, processor, operating system). The played and requested karaokes are sent without us knowing who is behind these requests. This is used to feed our lists of popular karaoke on your public interface but also on our online karaoke explorer.
PRIVACY_POLICY.L5: If you enable Sentry reports, then error reports created by the app are sent automatically to Sentry.io, a third-party service we use to collect information about errors. This allows us to better understand how an error happened and fix it in a future release. The service will send some of the app's event log, which can contain usernames. These logs contain minimal information.
PRIVACY_POLICY.L5_DETAILS: The Sentry report includes OS used, your Karaoke Mugen App version, the execution stack (where the code brainfarted), the app's state as well as your app's configuration (without any confidential information like Twitch tokens or JWT secrets). These reports are associated with your username (the user who installed the application), which makes it possible to find your reports easily if you ask us for help regarding a Karaoke Mugen bug. These reports are also published on our Discord (with a limited set of information, not compromising your configuration and the state of the application, these details being reserved to the application's maintainers) to be easily found.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P5: You can definitely do that! Online accounts aren't mandatory, as well as the other features mentioned above. You can enable/disable either stats and/or error reports in the system panel. You're still owning your data at any time.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P6: If you have questions or you want us to delete data, you can send us an e-mail at mugen@karaokes.moe.

ONLINE.TITLE: Karaoke Mugen Online
ONLINE.P1: Your Karaoke Mugen App was updated to 5.0, new features are available and some might require your attention. Do you want to enable the remote access for your instance? By clicking yes, a remote token will be generated automatically by the Karaoke Mugen Server. It expires after 10 days of inactivity.

BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.TITLE: Important changes to medias and repository management
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P1: Repositories and medias change a lot starting with this Karaoke Mugen version.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P2: Repository updates are now managed via git. This means that no matter which songs you had downloaded before, you now have access to the full karaoke database.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P3: We are well aware that not everyone could afford to download the whole karaoke database. We made it so that wasn't necessary anymore. Only the songs' metadata are now downloaded at startup.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.T1: But I can't download all the medias!
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P4: Don't panic. You now have access to all the songs, but their media aren't downloaded on your computer.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P5: Medias will be downloaded as you need them.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.L1: If you wish to play a song from the library, it'll be streamed from your repository's Karaoke Mugen Server. Your internet connection will be used to play the song directly.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.L2: If you add a song to a current playlist (used by the video player) the media will be downloaded in the background. If the download hasn't finished by the time you get to that song, it'll be streamed through internet. If it's done, it'll be played straight from your computer's storage.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.T2: What to do if I'm running out of space?
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P6: From the system panel, a new item "Disk space management" is available. Through it you can:
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.L3: Remove every media from a repository if you need some disk space in an emergency
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.L4: Remove only medias which haven't been played for one month (by default)
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.T3: What if I have to make a karaoke session at some place without internet access?
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P7: You can still download in advance every media from the download manager.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.T4: Is there anything I need to do?
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P8: Actually, none : Karaoke Mugen made sure that your online repositories got converted to make them compatible with the new update system. Your downloaded media will stay there and you'll be able to remove the unused ones at any time if you need to free disk space now.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P9: There's also a new option, per repository, which keeps Karaoke Mugen from downloading updated media on startup. For example, if a media is already present on your computer storage, but has been updated on your repository, the new version will be downloaded automatically.
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.T5: What happened to download blacklist criterias?
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P10: They have been migrated to regular blacklist criterias. This means that you won't see those blacklisted songs in your library, as if you had never downloaded them!
BULLDOZER_VIDEOS.P11: You can still modify blacklist criterias at any time.
